title: Ticket #6949: assert when running condor_q -g
description:
Krista seems to see an assert error running condor_q -g (as root)

ERROR "Assertion ERROR on (!(pjr->flags & 0x0004))" at line 4319 in file /slots/16/dir_3109781/userdir/.tmpVhmMVH/BUILD/condor-8.6.11/src/condor_q.V6/queue.cpp

Krista believes it is correlated to the presence of this line in her config file: 

SCHEDDGLIDEINS2_SPOOL_DIR_STRING = "$(SPOOL)"

Where "SCHEDDGLIDENS2" is a daemon in the DAEMON_LIST and is of type SCHEDD.

config dump attached.

Krista says:

If I delete this line I get the error: 

SCHEDDGLIDEINS2_SPOOL_DIR_STRING     = "$(SCHEDDGLIDEINS2.SPOOL)"


[root@cmsgwms-factory config.d]# condor_version
$CondorVersion: 8.6.11 May 10 2018 BuildID: 440910 $
$CondorPlatform: x86_64_RedHat7 $
attachments: • config_all.dump 41021 bytes added by zmiller on 2019-Mar-08 19:59:19 UTC.
